ygData.subject: RE: Infected Paw
ygData.msgSnippet: This happens to me all the time in W Karana.  Nothing more irritating than running down the road two hours later to suddenly seeing a whole camp of bandits
ygData.messageBody:
This happens to me all the time in W Karana. Nothing more irritating than
running down the road two hours later to suddenly seeing a whole camp of
bandits running towards you when they are barely in sight, and that only
because I have the clipping plane maxed out.

Kitasi

From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]

From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

EQ mobs will do this too, but they remember you unless you camp or zone.
And their agro radius to you is huge afterwards. I used to out run bandits
in West Commons all the time and see this.

Rokenn
